results.content: Este curso fala sobre assuntos importantes, porém, já esta bem defasado. Além disto é bem curto. Recomendo apenas para quem deseja conhecer superficialmente algumas ferramentas importantes do Django ou para aqueles que mantém sistemas com versões antigas do Django.
results.content_html: Este curso fala sobre assuntos importantes, porém, já esta bem defasado. Além disto é bem curto. Recomendo apenas para quem deseja conhecer superficialmente algumas ferramentas importantes do Django ou para aqueles que mantém sistemas com versões antigas do Django.

results.content: Me ha parecido que los temas que trata, que son muy interesantes, no los desarrolla. Son vídeos de 2 minutos donde explica por encima el tema, no lo desarrolla. Solo pone ejemplos simples de uso.
results.content_html: Me ha parecido que los temas que trata, que son muy interesantes, no los desarrolla. Son vídeos de 2 minutos donde explica por encima el tema, no lo desarrolla. Solo pone ejemplos simples de uso.

results.content: It was a great course, it gave a good overview on how Django works and some of the advanced functionalities of it. It'd be great to consider using DRF instead of Tastypie, since it contains some more advanced features and, IMHO, it's better to work with.
results.content_html: It was a great course, it gave a good overview on how Django works and some of the advanced functionalities of it. It'd be great to consider using DRF instead of Tastypie, since it contains some more advanced features and, IMHO, it's better to work with.

results.content: I thought the subject matter was well introduced, and presented concisely. It provided enough information to understand many important themes and concepts - even where my beginner/intermediate Django skills  limited my understanding of the subject matter being presented. I did the research where required to round out my knowledge, achieving my educational goals - but not necessarily with this course alone.
results.content_html: I thought the subject matter was well introduced, and presented concisely. It provided enough information to understand many important themes and concepts - even where my beginner/intermediate Django skills limited my understanding of the subject matter being presented. I did the research where required to round out my knowledge, achieving my educational goals - but not necessarily with this course alone.

results.content:
Taking this course is like claiming that you read a Physics textbook by only reading the table of contents.  It's only saving feature is that it does (barely, in the absolute quickest, minimalist way) introduce important concepts.

It's as if the author shows you a picture of an airliner cockpit, explain that you can see the control stick, throttle, radios, and then move on to the next video with "Okay, now that you know how to build a Boeing 787, let's move on..."

Nothing is explained or taught at more than a 2% level.  It's more like a list of important topics.

Nothing is explained or taught at more than a 2% level. It's more like a list of important topics.

results.content: Very good content. No examples to give the content context. If you could actually see examples it would be much more helpful. I really appreciate the pace and brevity, but if it could be tied to what the output looks like it would be much better.
